relevant_findings.skin_lesions: Vegetating, verrucous lesions on upper limbs and back
relevant_findings.knee: Painful, immobile and swollen left knee
relevant_findings.visual: Diminished visual acuity with exudative foci and flame-shaped hemorrhages in left eye

relevant_findings.skin_lesions: Marked improvement in verrucous skin lesions

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued improvement noted over subsequent months

relevant_findings.biopsy_results: Microscopic examination showed scarce mycotic elements

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin biopsy specimens were negative for fungi

relevant_findings.biopsy_results: Negative for fungi in aspirated material

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of lymph node lesions noted

physical_examinations.date: Approximately 4 months after Posaconazole therapy was discontinued
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Posaconazole therapy restarted due to culture growth of E. spinifera
